title: Add tooltips to timeline icons for note categories
description: Add tooltips to timeline icons in DevlogDetails component to show note category names when users hover over them. This builds on the recently implemented timeline icons feature to make the interface more user-friendly.

notes.content: Starting implementation by updating note-utils to provide tooltip-wrapped icons and updating DevlogDetails

âœ… Successfully implemented tooltips for timeline icons:

**Updated `/lib/note-utils.tsx`:**
- Added `Tooltip` import from antd
- Updated `getCategoryIcon()` to wrap icons with tooltips showing category labels
- Added `getCategoryIconRaw()` function for cases where tooltips aren't needed
- Tooltips positioned to the left of icons with `placement="left"`
- Uses existing `getCategoryLabel()` logic for tooltip text

**Automatic integration:**
- DevlogDetails component automatically benefits from tooltips since it imports `getCategoryIcon` from note-utils
- No changes needed to DevlogDetails component itself
- Maintains all existing functionality while adding hover context

**User experience improvements:**
- Hovering over timeline icons now shows category names (Progress, Issue, Solution, Idea, Reminder, Feedback)
- Tooltips provide clear context without cluttering the interface
- Consistent with Ant Design tooltip styling and behavior

Completed: Successfully added tooltips to timeline icons in DevlogDetails component. Timeline icons now display category names (Progress, Issue, Solution, Idea, Reminder, Feedback) when users hover over them. Implementation was done by updating the note-utils library to wrap icons with Ant Design Tooltip components, providing automatic integration with existing DevlogDetails functionality.
